verses.english: Have We not uplifted your heart for you ˹O Prophet˺,
which weighed so heavily on your back,
and elevated your renown for you?<sup foot_note=77626>1</sup>
So, surely with hardship comes ease.
Surely with ˹that˺ hardship comes ˹more˺ ease.<sup foot_note=77627>1</sup>
So once you have fulfilled ˹your duty˺, strive ˹in devotion˺,
turning to your Lord ˹alone˺ with hope.
